page.title: 14LIFE 3
page.content: {Thursdays.} Thursday mornings I get out of bed and have breakfast. For my breakfast I have Rice Crispies and afterwards I have to put my plate on the sink ready for washing up. I then go and get my clothes out if the airing cupboard and get dressed. I clean my teeth with Crest toothpaste and my tooth brush is blue. I do my hair while my mum is putting on her make up.I then have to have my medecine because I have Asthma. After that I get my shoes on , they are black, and then I go to school. After play we come into the school and have the register and assembly. We do some language work in our first "home base." My favourite jobs are maths and language. (Continued on page 15, Life 4.)
